title: Asa Iokepa de Neeve Aloha Memorial Scholarship Fund
description: To provide a scholarship to a graduate of Longmont High School admitted to the UCB College of Arts and Sciences in memory of Asa Iokepa de Neeve.
marketingContent: To provide a scholarship to a graduate of Longmont High School admitted to the UCB College of Arts and Sciences in memory of Asa Iokepa de Neeve.
